ai-patthana22.16:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.16:0.3_0: Seeing danger in what is good,
ai-patthana22.16:1.1_0: One who is not skilled in the teaching does not give rise to a refuge for the sake of unskillful.
ai-patthana22.16:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana22.16:2.1_0: Unskillfulness doesn’t give rise to a cause of good conduct. Since he doesn’t give rise to causes and reasons.
ai-patthana22.16:2.1_1: Not incoming or conducive to the teaching, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana22.16:2.1_2: Unskillful thoughts, nor has a cause or reasoned by conflict.
ai-patthana22.16:2.1_3: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana22.16:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
